casebody.data:
Rafael GONZALEZ, Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellee,
and
Kandis Purdie and Ricky Raines, Jr., Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
FARM BUREAU GENERAL INSURANCE, COMPANY OF MICHIGAN, Defendant/counterplaintiff-appellant,
and
Crystal Chantal Burns, Defendant. SC: 157487
COA: 331956 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 24, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for leave to file supplemental authority is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the January 4, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should now be reviewed by this Court.
